A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:

Who took over a fallen Sith Empire and saw the RISE AND FALL of the Empire according to the TFA Novel? He's is generic bad guy X. JJ built him up and Rian brought him crashing down. Luke? DEAD. Because force illusion across universe too draining something something? He doesn't train Rey with anything or give any real knowledge. Sit on this rock and breathe? Reach out so i can slap you with a blade of grass? I wont train you but then will train you only so you can see why you shoulndn't be a Jedi???

REY? Story about her lineage hyped for YEARS? With call backs and dragged along for 1.5 movies? Where JJ said her parents are in TFA only to walk it back? THEY WERE NOBODY!!!!! TA'DA!!!!!!!!

Phasma? Useless again. No reprimand by Snoke for DROPPING THE SHEILDS IN TFA????? SHE SAVED HERSELF AND SACRIFICED STARKILLER! FORGIVEN!

All Johnson wanted to do was create a Space Goodfellas. everyone got whacked.

im done with Star Wars. The EU was made LEGENDS for this shit movie. FU Pablo Hidalgo and the rest of you frauds at the story group too.
